p: Study subjects were consecutively recruited between January and October 2016. Inclusion criteria were age ≥18 years; BMI ≥19 kg/m 2, and a minimum scheduled inpatient stay of 10 days with at least 6 days for periodic fasting. Exclusion criteria were viral or autoimmune liver diseases, cognitive and psychological disorders, pregnancy or lactation, and inadequate language skills to communicate in English, French, or German.
